Reviews.Title: Not the best value
Reviews.Author: Voyager "Voyager"
Reviews.Content: Tripod central column lock knob and its nut were not installed... but thanks that is were inside the box ;) I have to figure out now how to install the nut. Also, central column doesn't go up-down smoothly. Probably I'll need to apply some silicon grease.2.5x Tele lens gives black border with round corners when fully zoomed out.
